item.description:
Products api list.

For these api you don't need authorization header.

Routes:

- _List:_ {{url}}/products
    
- _Details:_ {{url}}/products/:product

item.description:
Orders api list.

For these api you need authorization header.

Routes:

- _List:_ {{url}}/orders
    
- _Details:_ {{url}}/orders/:order
    
- _Submit:_ {{url}}/orders/create
